4 {

7 LyapunovController::LyapunovController(ros::NodeHandle &nh):Controller(nh)
8 {
9  ros::NodeHandle priv("~");
10  std::vector<float> lyapunov;
11  if(!priv.getParam("lyapunov",lyapunov))
12  {
13  throw NecessaryParamException(priv.resolveName("lyapunov"));
14  }
15  else
16  {
17  this->parameter_=LyapunovParameter(lyapunov);
18  }
19 
20  this->server_.setCallback(boost::bind(&LyapunovController::dynConfigcallback,this,_1,_2));
21 
22 }
23 
24 Controller::ControlVector LyapunovController::calcControl(State current_state ,State target_state)
25 {
26  double omega=target_state.ang_vel.z();
27  double v=sqrt(pow(target_state.lin_vel.x(),2)+pow(target_state.lin_vel.y(),2));
28 
29  tf::Transform control_dif=current_state.pose.inverseTimes(target_state.pose);
30 
31  double x=control_dif.getOrigin().getX();
32  double y=control_dif.getOrigin().getY();
33 
34  double phi=tf::getYaw(control_dif.getRotation());
35  if(phi>=M_PI_2)
36  {
37  phi-=M_PI;
38  v=-v;
39  }
40  else if( phi<=-M_PI_2)
41  {
42 
43  phi=phi+M_PI;
44  v=-v;
45 
46  }
47 
48  control_dif.setRotation(tf::createQuaternionFromYaw(phi));
49  this->control_diff_.pose=control_dif;
50  this->control_diff_.lin_vel=target_state.lin_vel-current_state.lin_vel;
51  this->control_diff_.ang_vel=target_state.lin_vel-current_state.lin_vel;
52 
53  ControlVector output;
54  output.v=this->parameter_.kx*x+v*cos(phi);
55  output.omega=omega+this->parameter_.ky*v*y+this->parameter_.kphi*sin(phi);
56 
57  return output;
58 }
59 
60 void LyapunovController::dynConfigcallback(multi_robot_controller::LyapunovConfig &config, uint32_t level) {
61  ROS_INFO("Reconfigure Request: %lf %lf %lf",config.kx,config.ky,config.kphi);
62  this->parameter_=LyapunovParameter(config.kx,config.ky,config.kphi);
63 }
